text: Sergei Viktorovich Fedorov (Russian:Сергей Викторович Фёдоров, Sergey Viktorovich Fyodorov; born December 13 1969 in Pskov, Soviet Union) is a Russian retired professional ice hockey forward and occasional defenseman who plays for the Washington Capitals of the National Hockey League. He gained fame playing for the Detroit Red Wings before tenures with the Mighty Ducks of Anaheim and Columbus Blue Jackets. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1969 births Category:Columbus Blue Jackets players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Hart Memorial Trophy winners Category:Living people Category:Mighty Ducks of Anaheim players Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Russia Category:Olympic silver medalists for Russia Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Washington Capitals players Category:Ice hockey centres
title: Sergei Fedorov
